content_blocks.title: Group Policy Essentials

content.text: This lesson covers GPO, Policy inheritance, Security settings, User/Computer policies. You'll learn the fundamentals and practical applications.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Think of this like GPO in everyday life...
